properties.label: Button Label
properties.name: buttonLabel
properties.help: Labels displayed in the widget when an item is selected, it has to be space separated

properties.label: Item Label
properties.name: itemLabel
properties.help: Labels displayed in the list of items to select, it has to be space separated

properties.label: Output Properties
properties.name: outputProperties
properties.defaultValue: Object atributes we want to return, it has to be space separated or empty if we want the whole object
